citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
***The facility has recently acquired a new Attending Veterinarian who has not yet made a visit to the facility or written a
Program of Veterinary Care. The written Program shall address all types of animals the facility plans to exhibit. Formal
arrangements with the Attending Veterinarian shall include a written program of veterinary care (including the Primate
environmental enhancement Plan and the Bird environmental enhancement Plan) and regularly scheduled visits to the
premises.
Please contact me when ready for the next re-license inspection.
Correct by April 7, 2025.
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by May 20, 2025 or the applicant will forfeit the license fee
and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
***The facility has recently acquired a new Attending Veterinarian who has not yet made a visit to the facility or written a 
Program of Veterinary Care. The written Program shall address all types of animals the facility plans to exhibit. Formal 
arrangements with the Attending Veterinarian shall include a written program of veterinary care (including the Primate 
environmental enhancement Plan and the Bird environmental enhancement Plan) and regularly scheduled visits to the 
premises.  
 
Please contact me when ready for the next re-license inspection. 
 
Correct by April 7, 2025. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by May 20, 2025 or the applicant will forfeit the license fee 
and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires. 
 
 n
